      post: Shows the initial menu

      • initialMenu

        public boolean initialMenu()
        Displays the initial menu where the user can login, signin and leave the app
        pre: There must be an App created
        post: Shows the initial menu
        Returns:
        A boolean that says if it repeats the menu or leave

      • logInMenu

        public java.lang.String logInMenu()
        Its the menu where the user can get in a existing account if it have one
        pre: The user must have selected the option LOG_IN and the App must be created
        post: Displays the login menu
        Returns:
        the user's nickname to work with it along the task that it selects

      • userMenu

        public boolean userMenu(java.lang.String nickname)
        Displays all the options that a user can do, depending on its selection sends it to differnt methods or just leaves
        pre: There must at least one user created in the app's users array
        post: Display the user menu
        Parameters:
        nickname - its the logged in user's nickname. nickname != null
        Returns:
        If the users wants to leave the menu or not
